languages.text: "Что? Да, это стандартизированная оценка, не спорьте". {n}Клерк задумчиво касается наконец переставшего искрить импланта.{/n} "Отлично, очень хорошо! Мы почти закончили... Теперь прошу вас раздеться для финального протоколирования".

"What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."
languages.original_text: "Что? Да, это стандартизированная оценка, не спорьте". {n}Клерк задумчиво касается наконец переставшего искрить импланта.{/n} "Отлично, очень хорошо! Мы почти закончили... Теперь прошу вас раздеться для финального протоколирования".

traits.locale_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take your clothes off."

"What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take your clothes off."

"What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

"What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

"What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

languages.text: «¿Qué? Sí. Es una evaluación estandarizada. No la cuestione». {n}El funcionario se toca el implante, pensativo. Por fin ha dejado de echar chispas.{/n} «¡Excelente, muy bien! Ya casi estamos... Ahora, para finalizar el registro de su inventario, necesito que se quite la ropa».
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? Sí. Es una evaluación estandarizada. No la cuestione». {n}El funcionario se toca el implante, pensativo. Por fin ha dejado de echar chispas.{/n} «¡Excelente, muy bien! Ya casi estamos... Ahora, para finalizar el registro de su inventario, necesito que se quite la ropa».

languages.text: “怎么了？没错，这是标准化的评估程序，请不要进行争论。”{n}职员若有所思地摸着头上的植入物。此刻，植入物终于不再迸射火花了。{/n}“太棒了，非常完美！马上就结束了……只剩最后一步就能完成了，请你把衣服脱掉。”
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: “怎么了？没错，这是标准化的评估程序，请不要进行争论。”{n}职员若有所思地摸着头上的植入物。此刻，植入物终于不再迸射火花了。{/n}“太棒了，非常完美！马上就结束了……只剩最后一步就能完成了，请你把衣服脱掉。”

languages.text: 「なんです？はい。評価は標準化されています。それについて文句を言わないでください」{n}事務員は哀しげにインプラントに触る。最終的に火花を散らすのが止まる。{/n}「素晴らしい、よくやりました！ほとんど終わりました…では、インベントリ記録を最終化するために、服を脱いでください」
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: 「なんです？はい。評価は標準化されています。それについて文句を言わないでください」{n}事務員は哀しげにインプラントに触る。最終的に火花を散らすのが止まる。{/n}「素晴らしい、よくやりました！ほとんど終わりました…では、インベントリ記録を最終化するために、服を脱いでください」

languages.text: « Hein, quoi ? Vous avez bien entendu. Les critères d'évaluation sont standardisés. Inutile de discuter. » {n}Le greffier touche son implant d'un air pensif. Il a enfin cessé de crépiter.{/n} « Bien, bien ! Nous en avons presque terminé... À présent, veuillez vous déshabiller, que je parachève votre signalement. »
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: « Hein, quoi ? Vous avez bien entendu. Les critères d'évaluation sont standardisés. Inutile de discuter. » {n}Le greffier touche son implant d'un air pensif. Il a enfin cessé de crépiter.{/n} « Bien, bien ! Nous en avons presque terminé... À présent, veuillez vous déshabiller, que je parachève votre signalement. »

languages.text: "Ne? Evet. Değerlendirmeniz standarttır. İtiraz etmeyin." {n}Kâtip, düşünceli bir şekilde implantına dokunuyor. İmplantı nihayet kıvılcım saçmayı bırakıyor.{/n} "Mükemmel, çok iyi! Neredeyse bitirdik... Envanter kaydınızı tamamlamak için lütfen kıyafetlerinizi çıkarın."
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Evet. Değerlendirmeniz standarttır. İtiraz etmeyin." {n}Kâtip, düşünceli bir şekilde implantına dokunuyor. İmplantı nihayet kıvılcım saçmayı bırakıyor.{/n} "Mükemmel, çok iyi! Neredeyse bitirdik... Envanter kaydınızı tamamlamak için lütfen kıyafetlerinizi çıkarın."

languages.text: "Was? Ja. Das Gutachten ist standardisiert. Zweifelt es nicht an." {n}Der Beamte berührt nachdenklich sein Implantat. Endlich sprüht es keine Funken mehr.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet, sehr gut! Wir sind fast fertig ... Für den Abschluss Eures Inventareintrags legt jetzt bitte Eure Kleidung ab."
languages.original_text: "What? Yes. The assessment is standardised. Don't argue with it." {n}The clerk touches his implant pensively. It has finally stopped sparking.{/n} "Excellent, very good! We're almost done... Now, to finalise your inventory record, please take off your clothes."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Ja. Das Gutachten ist standardisiert. Zweifelt es nicht an." {n}Der Beamte berührt nachdenklich sein Implantat. Endlich sprüht es keine Funken mehr.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet, sehr gut! Wir sind fast fertig ... Für den Abschluss Eures Inventareintrags legt jetzt bitte Eure Kleidung ab."
